name: Magic Mountain Climb
description:
Explore the intriguing insides of a mysterious mountain and take in the breathtaking views from the outside while trying to get to the top.

On this 2d platformer, challenging levels filled with danger will try to stop you on the way to the peak.

Controls: 

  • A/D or Left Ar./Right Ar. – movement
  • Spacebar – jump
  • Enter – firing
  • Escape – Back to main menu
